select oi.id, oi.code, oi.user_id, oi.vehicle_options, oi.staff_options, oi.start_address, oi.end_address, oi.start_longitude, oi.start_latitude, oi.end_longitude, oi.end_latitude, oi.distance_length, oi.images, oi.status, oi.create_date, oi.amount, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, ui.images as userImages from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND oi.status = #{orderInfo.status}
order by oi.create_date desc
